patthana23.54:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.54:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.54:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
